activeServerSlot.where: <emojiID> - The ID of the emoji you want to as the icon when slots in an MPA are filled

inactiveServerSlot.where: <emojiID> - The ID of the emoji you want to as the icon when slots in an MPA are not filled

embedColor.where: `<hexcolorcode>` - The color in hex format (#xxxxxx). If you do not know the color in hex, use a tool such as google's hex color picker.

mpaBlock.where: `<blockNumber>` - The desired block number to meet at.

mpaExpirationEnabled.where: `<true/false>` - to true if you want to automatically close MPAs after a certain amount of time has passed without any action being done to the list. to false to disable this feature.

mpaExpirationTime.where:
`<number>` - Desired number in either hours, minutes, or seconds
`<h/m/s>` - h for hours, m for minutes, s for seconds

mpaManagerRoles.where: `<role>` - Desired role to add to the list. Can be either the ID of the role or you can @ the role

privateMpa.where: `<true/false>` - Setting to true restricts access to the MPA to whitelisted roles only. Setting to false disables this rule.

mpaAllowedRoles.where: `<role>` - Desired role to add to the list. Can be either the ID of the role or you can @ the role.
